username.title: Username
username.description: Username to connect to Impala. This user should have privileges to read all the metadata in Impala.

hostPort.title: Host and Port
hostPort.description: Host and port of the Impala service.

auth_mechanism.title: Authentication Mode
auth_mechanism.description: Authentication mode to connect to Impala.

kerberos_service_name.title: Kerberos Service Name
kerberos_service_name.description: If authenticating with Kerberos specify the Kerberos service name

databaseSchema.title: databaseSchema
databaseSchema.description: databaseSchema of the data source. This is optional parameter, if you would like to restrict the metadata reading to a single databaseSchema. When left blank, OpenMetadata Ingestion attempts to scan all the databaseSchema.

databaseName.title: Database Name
databaseName.description: Optional name to give to the database in OpenMetadata. If left blank, we will use default as the database name.

authOptions.title: URL Authentication Options
authOptions.description: Authentication options to pass to Impala connector. These options are based on SQLAlchemy.
